exam.question: We must look beyond ______ and assumptions and try to discover what is missing.

answer.explain: 句意： 我们必须看透幻想和主观臆断， 并努力找出遗漏的东西。justification： 理由； 辩护； manifestation： 显现； 表现； specification： 详述； 规格。

exam.question: The magician made us think he cut the girl into pieces but it was merely an ______ .

answer.explain: 句意： 魔术师让我们以为他把那个女孩切成了几块， 但那只不过是个假象。impression： 印象； 感想； image： 肖像， 形象； illumination： 照亮； 阐明。

sentences.sContent: She was under no illusion that he loved her.
It is an illusion that the Arctic is dark in winter.
sentences.sCn: 认为北极冬天一片黑暗是错误的。

sentences.sContent: She had no illusions about her physical attractiveness.
sentences.sCn: 她对自己外表的吸引力不抱幻想。

sentences.sContent: ‘I hate to shatter your illusions,’ he said.
sentences.sCn: “我不愿意打破你的幻想。”他说。

synos.tran: 幻觉，[心理]错觉；错误的观念或信仰
